name: Unexpected Windfall
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Spoils of the Hunt
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each mana from a Treasure that was spent to cast this spell. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "Every coin helps rebuild the town they destroyed."

name: Potion of Healing
oracle_text:
When Potion of Healing enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Potion of Healing: You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Magic can knit the body back together, but the courage to fight on comes only from within.

name: Forsworn Paladin
oracle_text:
Menace
{1}{B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a Treasure token.
{2}{B}: Target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to activate this ability, that creature also gains deathtouch until end of turn.

name: Demogorgon's Clutches
oracle_text: Target opponent dsicards two cards, mills two cards, and loses 2 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text: The good will be corrupted, the kind will be devoured, and all will be dragged into the bottomless Abyss.

name: "Hob Boss"
oracle_text:
Other Goblins you control get +1/+1.
{R}, {T}: "Hob Boss" deals damage to any target equal to the number of Goblins that entered the battlefield under your control this turn.

name: Soulknife Spy
oracle_text: Whenever Soulknife Spy deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: My psychic blade cuts the mind and severs thoughts. Even if you survive, you'll never remember I was here.

name: Teleportation Circle
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target artifact or creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text:
"Hold on to your lunch!"
—Bartleby, gnome wizard

name: Teleportation Circle
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target artifact or creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: "Talisman of Segador"
oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, it gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, defending player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: "Talisman of the Trickster"
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice "Talisman of the Trickster". If you do, create a token that's a copy of this creature."
Equip {2}

name: Arcane Investigator
oracle_text:
Search the Room — {5}{U}: Roll a d20.
1-9 | Draw a card.
10-20 | Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Scaled Herbalist
oracle_text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "I could help you, or I could eat you for lunch,. I haven't decided yet."

name: Dancing Sword
Dancing Sword
Old Gnawbone
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, create that many Treasure tokens.
flavor_text: The ancient green dragon Claugiyliamatar is often seen with a manned corpse dangling from her mouth.

name: Xorn
oracle_text: If you would create one or more Treasure tokens, instead create those tokens plus an additional Treasure token.
flavor_text: Xorns are native to the Elemental Plane of Earth, where gems and rare stones are plentiful. When summoned elsewhere they can be quite destructive in search of food.

name: Old Gnawbone
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, create that many Treasure tokens.

name: Xorn
oracle_text: If you would create one or more Treasure tokens, instead create those tokens plus an additional Treasure token.

name: Barbarian Class
oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
If you would roll one or more dice, instead roll that many dice plus one and ignore the lowest roll.
{1}{R}: Level 2
Whenever you roll one or more dice, target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains menance until end of turn.
{2}{R}: Level 3
Creatures you control have haste.

name: Warlock Class
oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, each opponent loses 1 life.
{1}{B}: Level 2
When this class becomes level 2, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
{6}{B}: Level 3
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses life equal to the life they lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)

name: Cleric Class
oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
If you would gain life, you gain that much plus 1 life instead.
{3}{W}: Level 2
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{4}{W}: Level 3
When this Class becomes level 3, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You gain life equal to its toughness.

name: Bard Class
oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
Legendary creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them.
{R}{G}: Level 2
Legendary spells you cast cost {R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.
{3}{R}{G}: Level 3
Whenever you cast a legendary spell, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them this turn.

name: Prosper, Tome-Bound
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Mystic Arcanum — At the beginning of your end step, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
Pact Boon — Whenever you play a card from exile, create a Treasure token.

name: Minsc, Beloved Ranger
oracle_text:
When Minsc, Beloved Ranger enters the battlefield, create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.
{X}: Until end of turn, target creature you control has base power and toughness X/X and becomes a Giant in addition to its other types. Activate only a sorcery.

name: Wizard Class
oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
{2}{U}: Level 2
When this Class becomes level 2, draw two cards.
{4}{U}: Level 3
Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

name: Ranger Class
oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
When Ranger Class enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
{1}{G}: Level 2
Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature.
{3} {G}: Level 3
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast creature spells from the top of your library.

name: You Meet in a Tavern
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Form a Party — Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
• Start a Brawl — Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Treasure Chest
oracle_text:
{4}, Sacrifice Treasure Chest: Roll a d20.
1 | Trapped! — You lose 3 life.
2-9 | Create five Treasure tokens.
10-19 | You gain 3 life and draw three cards.
20 | Search your library for a card. If it's an artifact card you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle.

oracle_text:
Flying
Fire Breath — When Red Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each opponent.

name: Hulking Bugbear
oracle_text: Haste

15-20 | Create one of those tokens. You may roll again.

oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)

oracle_text:
Flying
When Djinni Windseeker enters the battlefield, roll a d20.
1-9 | Scry 1.
10-19 | Scry 2.
20 | Scry 3.

name: Sefris of the Hidden Ways
oracle_text:
Whenever one or more creature cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, venture into the dungeon. This ability triggers only once each turn. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
Create Undead — Whenever you complete a dungeon, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Sorcerer Class
oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
When Sorcerer Class enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard two cards.
{U}{R}: Level 2
Creatures you control have "{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell or to gain a Class level."
{3}{U}{R}: Level 3
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, that spell deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of instant or sorcery spells you've cast this turn.

name: Rogue Class
oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
Whenever a creature you controls deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library face down. You may look at it for as long as it remains exiled.
{1}{U}{B}: Level 2
Creatures you control have menace.
{2}{U}{B}: Level 3
You may play cards exiled with Rogue Class, and you may spend mana as through it were mana of any color to cast them.

name: Ingenious Smith
oracle_text:
When Ingenious Smith enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Whenever one or more artifacts enter the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Ingenious Smith. This ability triggers only once each turn.

name: Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients
oracle_text:
Enrage — Whenever Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients is dealt damage, you may create a 5/4 red and green Dragon Spirit creature token with "When this creature deals damage, sacrifice it."
Whenever you roll one or more dice, you may have Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients deal 1 damage to itself.

name: Price of Loyalty
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to cast this spell, that creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Most folks got mayhem in their hearts. Jost gotta know their price."

name: Split the Party
oracle_text: Choose target player. Return half the creatures they control to their owner's hand, rounded up.

name: Sepulcher Ghoul
oracle_text: Sacrifice another creature: Sepulcher Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: Ghouls devour the dead and any living creatures unwary enough to fall into their grasp.

name: Dire Wolf Prowler
